title: How to Freshen Crackers in a Microwave

steps.headline: Choose the crackers that you want to freshen.
steps.description: Lay them on a single sheet of kitchen paper towel on the microwave dish. If you need more space, you will need to do this in lots.

steps.headline: Microwave the crackers for 40 seconds on medium/high.
Remove the crackers from the microwave and leave to one side upon a cooling rack for a few minutes to cool down.
steps.description: Although they feel soft when you first remove them, on cooling they will crisp up and be as fresh as new.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Eat them as usual, with dips, spreads, cheese, or by themselves etc.
